title: [110. Balanced Binary Tree](https://leetcode.cn/problems/balanced-binary-tree/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
110. Balanced Binary Tree Description Given a binary tree, determine if it is height-balanced.
 
Example 1:
Input: root = [3,9,20,null,null,15,7] Output: true Example 2:
Input: root = [1,2,2,3,3,null,null,4,4] Output: false Example 3:
Input: root = [] Output: true  
Constraints:
The number of nodes in the tree is in the range [0, 5000]. -104 <= Node.val <= 104 Related Topics Tree Depth-First Search Binary Tree Similar Questions Maximum Depth of Binary Tree
